comment.author: 32921850@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Italian wall slogans etc. from the Fascist Era for non-Fascists, and we'd love to have this added to the group! See the official plaque offered to Neville Chamberlain and Lord Edward Halifax by the Gruppo Montecatini on 13 January 1939: AVTARCHIA [http://www.flickr.com/photos/smailtronic/2361897515/]
